DOC.brief_title: Effect Neostigmine Recovery Rocuronium : A Comparison Between Partial TOF Ratio-Based Dose
DOC.detailed_description: Approval Ethical Committee Faculty Medicine University Indonesia acquire prior conduct study . Subjects give informed consent enrol study randomize two group . Intravenous ( IV ) cannula Ringer Lactate fluid , non-invasive blood pressure monitor , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) pulse-oxymetry set subject operation room . After preoxygenation give 100 % oxygen , general anesthesia induction do midazolam 0.01-0.02 mg/kg , fentanyl 3 mcg/kg , propofol 1-2 mg/kg , rocuronium 0.6 mg/kg . Following induction , endotracheal intubation laryngeal mask insertion perform . Maintenance do sevoflurane 1.2 vol % , fentanyl 1.2 mcg/kg . After surgery finish , fentanyl drip stop . Subjects observe spontaneous breath occur adequately ( tidal volume ≥ 5 ml/kg ) train four ( TOF ) ratio evaluate use acceleromyography ( AMG ) . Before reversal ( neostigmine ) give , anesthetic gas stop duration operation well post-operative TOF ratio record . The time since reversal give record . Group A receive neostigmine partial dose ( 0.02 mg ) combination atropine 0.4 mg every milligram neostigmine . Group B receive TOF ratio-based dose neostigmine combination atropine 0.4 mg every milligram neostigmine . After administration neostigmine , TOF ratio measure every 5 minute TOF ratio ≥ 90 % achieve , finally definitive airway could remove . For Group A , another partial dose neostigmine give 10 minute first reversal dose TOF ratio ≥90 % reach . For Group B , another TOF ratio-based dose neostigmine give 10 minute first reversal dose TOF ratio ≥90 % reach . Subjects transported recovery room . Data analyze use Statistical Package Social Sciences ( SPSS ) , numerical data use unpaired T-test Mann-Whitney-U test , categorical data use Chi-square test Fischer Exact 's Test . Data normality test Kolmogorov-Smirnov test . Significant value p < 0.05 .
